name: Dot Hunt
description:
Gameplay

In DotHunt you have to play as GreenDot and survive in labyrinths with enemies of different types, collect coins, earn lives and set new records.

Enemies

  You will meet 2 types of enemies:

BlueDot

BlueDot is nimble enough, but despite this, it is not capable of anything on its own. You should be afraid of BlueDots when they are in a group, because then they can press you against the wall and kill you.



RedDot

RedDot is not as fast, but it can kill you with one touch if you have no extra life.

Also on a level with RedDots, by typing 5 coins, you will receive 1 life which will protect you from the deadly touch of RedDot.

Survive and break new records in the DotHunt!
